pkgmetadata.longdescription: Clustering Big Data using Expectation Maximization Star (EM*) Algorithm // Implements the Improved Expectation Maximisation EM* and the traditional EM algorithm for clustering big data (gaussian mixture models for both multivariate and univariate datasets). This version implements the faster alternative EM* that avoids revisiting data by leveraging the heap structure. The implementation supports both random and K-means++ based initialization. Reference: Hasan Kurban, Mark Jenne, Mehmet M. Dalkilic (2016) doi:10.1007/s41060-017-0062-1. This work is partially supported by NCI Grant 1R01CA213466-01.
